title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: American Airlines beefs up its mobile app with new rebooking, bag-tracking tech
items.description: American Airlines is improving its mobile app in 2026 with new ways to help passengers get their trips back on track after flight delays.

items.title: The 4 classes of Princess Cruises ships, explained
items.description: The Princess Cruises fleet comprises 17 ships that break down into four distinct classes. Here's a guide to them all.

items.title: Bilt Obsidian Card review: Earn valuable points in popular bonus categories
items.description: The Bilt Obsidian is the mid-tier Bilt Rewards card with bonus categories. Earn valuable Bilt points on dining, groceries, travel, rent and mortgages....

items.title: First look: Kimpton Main Frankfurt brings signature quiet luxury to an up-and-coming city
items.description: The Kimpton brand's German debut brings warm service and Bauhaus-inspired design to an underrated city.

items.title: The 5 most desirable cabin locations on any cruise ship
items.description: Wondering which cabin you should choose for a cruise? These are the most desirable cabin locations on any cruise ship.
